Package com.intellij.openapi.editor.actionSystem

Class EditorActionHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.intellij.openapi.editor.actionSystem.EditorActionHandler
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    BackspaceHandler, BaseFoldingHandler, ChooseItemAction.Handler, CloneCaretActionHandler, CopyHandler, EditorWriteActionHandler, EndHandler, EscapeHandler, EscapeHandler, EscapeHandler, EscapeHandler, IncrementalFindAction.Handler, IncrementalSearchHandler.BackSpaceHandler, IncrementalSearchHandler.DownHandler, IncrementalSearchHandler.UpHandler, JavadocLineStartHandler, JavaNextParameterHandler, JavaPrevParameterHandler, JoinLinesHandler, LfeBaseEditorActionHandler, LookupActionHandler, NextParameterAfterCompletionHandler, PageDownAction.Handler, PageDownWithSelectionAction.Handler, PageUpAction.Handler, PageUpWithSelectionAction.Handler, PasteHandler, PrevNextParameterHandler, SearchAgainAction.Handler, SelectAllHandler, SelectOccurrencesActionHandler, SelectWordAtCaretAction.Handler, SelectWordHandler, StartNewLineHandler, TemplateLineStartEndHandler, UnSelectWordHandler, XPathAppComponent.FindNextHandler, XPathAppComponent.FindPreviousHandler

    public abstract class EditorActionHandler
extends java.lang.Object
    Interface for actions activated by keystrokes in the editor. Implementations should override execute(Editor, Caret, DataContext) .

    Two types of handlers are supported: the ones which are executed once, and the ones which are executed for each caret. The latter can be created using EditorActionHandler(boolean) constructor.

    See Also:
    EditorActionManager.setActionHandler(String, EditorActionHandler)

    • Method Detail

      • isEnabled

        @Deprecated
public boolean isEnabled(Editor editor,
                         DataContext dataContext)
        Deprecated. Implementations should override isEnabledForCaret(Editor, Caret, DataContext) instead, client code should invoke isEnabled(Editor, Caret, DataContext) instead.

      • isEnabledForCaret

        protected boolean isEnabledForCaret(Editor editor,
                                    Caret caret,
                                    DataContext dataContext)
        Implementations can override this method to define whether handler is enabled for a specific caret in a given editor.

      • isEnabled

        public final boolean isEnabled(Editor editor,
                               Caret caret,
                               DataContext dataContext)
        If caret is null, checks whether handler is enabled in general (i.e. enabled for at least one caret in editor), if caret is not null, checks whether it's enabled for specified caret.

      • execute

        @Deprecated
public void execute(Editor editor,
                    DataContext dataContext)
        Deprecated. To implement action logic, override doExecute(Editor, Caret, DataContext), to invoke the handler, call execute(Editor, Caret, DataContext).

      • doExecute

        protected void doExecute(Editor editor,
                         Caret caret,
                         DataContext dataContext)
        Executes the action in the context of given caret. Subclasses should override this method.
        Parameters:
        editor - the editor in which the action is invoked.
        caret - the caret for which the action is performed at the moment, or null if it's a 'one-off' action executed without current context
        dataContext - the data context for the action.

      • executeInCommand

        public boolean executeInCommand(Editor editor,
                                DataContext dataContext)

      • runForAllCarets

        public boolean runForAllCarets()

      • execute

        public final void execute(Editor editor,
                          Caret contextCaret,
                          DataContext dataContext)
        Executes the action in the context of given caret. If the caret is null, and the handler is a 'per-caret' handler, it's executed for all carets.
        Parameters:
        editor - the editor in which the action is invoked.
        dataContext - the data context for the action.

      • getCommandGroupId

        public DocCommandGroupId getCommandGroupId(Editor editor)
